General.Name: SSAW Hotels & Resorts Group Co.Ltd.
General.Description: SSAW Hotels & Resorts Group Co.,Ltd. manages and operates hotels. It operates hotels in Shanghai, Zhejiang, Jiangsu, Hainan, Hubei, Anhui, Jiangxi, Guangxi, and other cities in China. SSAW Hotels & Resorts Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: Sovereign Hotel Hangzhou Xixi Valley, Hangzhou, China, 310013
